title: Rumbling concern over Parliament's buildings
content: Parliamentarians have been warned that the building they work in is in danger of flood and fire.
en_content: Parliamentarians have been warned that the building they work in is in danger of flood and fire.

title: Rumbling concern over Parliament's buildings

title: Labour backs move to curb fire-and-rehire
content: A Labour MP is seeking to make it more difficult to lay off workers and rehire them on worse terms.
en_title: Labour backs move to curb fire-and-rehire
en_content: A Labour MP is seeking to make it more difficult to lay off workers and rehire them on worse terms.

title: Give every household Â£320 for energy costs - Greens
content: The Green Party of England and Wales says the Â£9bn plan could be paid for with a tax on landlords.

title: Ex-Labour MP Frank Field is dying, peer reveals
content: A statement from the veteran politician was read out in the Lords, backing a new assisted dying bill.
en_title: Ex-Labour MP Frank Field is dying, peer reveals
en_content: A statement from the veteran politician was read out in the Lords, backing a new assisted dying bill.

title: MPs offered security protection at surgeries
content: Home Secretary Priti Patel and Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle urged MPs to take up the offer.

en_content: Home Secretary Priti Patel and Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle urged MPs to take up the offer.

title: PM warned over aid cuts ahead of climate summit
content: Government advisers express "deep concern" at planned reductions in aid spending before COP26.

en_content: Government advisers express "deep concern" at planned reductions in aid spending before COP26.

title: Politicians turn blind eye to extremism - ex-minister
content: Ex-Communities Secretary Robert Jenrick says the UK's counter-extremism strategy has "lost its way".
